website_summaries.verdict: Excellent soccer shoe with multiple children's sizes available. Comfortable and durable.
pros: Flexible, lightweight shoes offered at a good price point
These stylish cleats from top brand Adidas contain sturdy materials like synthetic leather that will last your child for the entire season
cons: Fit may not work for children who have wide feet

customer_reviews.title: The shoes are very pretty. My son complained after the first 20 minutes ...
customer_reviews.text: The shoes are very pretty. My son complained after the first 20 minutes that the shoes are too narrow and hurt the outside of his foot. He loved the color so he tried to use them. After the second time, he complained again and cannot wear them, even though he loves the color/design. Because he's worn them twice, I don't think I can get my money back. I didn't ask to send them back so that's not a shot against the vendor. The shoes are simply too narrow for my son's foot and he's never complained about shoes before.
customer_reviews.author: Ariashaka

customer_reviews.title: Great shoes and great price
customer_reviews.text: These are great firm ground shoes. Most of the fields around us have a lot of clay in the soil, which means harder ground. On dry ground, they are very good. These don't work as well in muddy conditions, but they work well enough. They fit true to size on our size 3.5 boy football (*ahem* soccer) player. They are lightweight, have good long laces (not too long), and flexible. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Mark J. Pescatrice

customer_reviews.title: Decent kids' shoe
customer_reviews.text: My son LOVES these shoes. I have no idea how comfortable they are or how long he could wear them, since after a game he takes them off. They're definitely... bright. I expect his cleats to look a bit narrow compared to other types of shoes, but he says they feel great, don't pinch, all that. A decent reasonably priced shoe and with prime delivery was quick and painless.
customer_reviews.author: QueenRoachie

customer_reviews.title: Perfect! Ships fast!
customer_reviews.text: I had never ordered cleats online but it really worked out. My son is having a great season in these. Great price too.
customer_reviews.author: Tracey V

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Performance Soccer Cleats for Kids
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for my 8y/o as a replacement for a cheaper pair from Big5 that caused blisters from one hour of wear. The Addidas performance soccer cleats are an excellent pair, lightweight, comfortable, perfect arch and back of heel support.
customer_reviews.author: Yana A.

customer_reviews.title: Cool Adidas
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for my rising star soccer player son and they fit really nicely on him. He is not wiggling around in it, and holds up his feet pretty well. Great pair of cleats, however long they may last.
customer_reviews.author: arcanax

customer_reviews.title: they are awesome! comfortable and durable!
customer_reviews.text: survived a lot of soccer games and still look in pretty good shape...
customer_reviews.author: DL

customer_reviews.title: orange shoes.
customer_reviews.text: they are better than the ones target has. run true to size, and are cheaper than any i found locally. they are SOOOOO orange. my kid likes that though.
customer_reviews.author: jacqueline

customer_reviews.title: Very Good Product.
customer_reviews.text: Best soccer shoe he's ever had. First time ever I didn't had to buy two pair. Will purchase again. It survive 3days week of practice and games every Saturday.
customer_reviews.author: PurpleRain

customer_reviews.title: This is a great shoe. Unfortunately
customer_reviews.text: This is a great shoe. Unfortunately, I was sent the wrong size. It may run a little big because my son wears a size 12 and he could fit his foot in the 11 but his foot was almost touching the tip
customer_reviews.author: Jae J

customer_reviews.title: Nice!
customer_reviews.text: Great boot that looks sharp on my daughter. They are holding up well through the spring season and she likes them.
customer_reviews.author: Renee Ruocco

customer_reviews.title: Have a lot of miles on them.
customer_reviews.text: My daughter uses these for her club soccer (year around), They get a lot of use and she loves them.
customer_reviews.author: AndyG

customer_reviews.title: Too narrow, not comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Too narrow, not comfortable. Ordered for a 7 year old boy. Too tight. Had to go back.
customer_reviews.author: Maar Daniels

customer_reviews.title: Great shoes and great price.
customer_reviews.text: For my son who plays soccer...great shoes and great price. What is not to like?? Definitely buy them.
customer_reviews.author: AlohaFitz

customer_reviews.title: That's better than too small
customer_reviews.text: Runs about half size larger than most other soccer shoes. That's better than too small, and the price was right!
customer_reviews.author: Steven Dinerman

customer_reviews.title: Nice soccer shoes
customer_reviews.text: Nice quality soccer shoes. My son thinks they are very comfortable, and they look great w/his soccer uniform.
customer_reviews.author: Heather

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: My son likes these but they are pretty flimsy and lightweight so we'll see how long they last.
customer_reviews.author: Georgina Jimenez

customer_reviews.title: Shoes fit perfectly... Son loves the color ...
customer_reviews.text: Shoes fit perfectly ... Son loves the color of them and they look brand new after being used for a whole season. Highly recommended
customer_reviews.author: brittany

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Better than those available in store and at a great price. Look nice too. Fully Satisfied with purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Dev Bhatia

customer_reviews.title: ... bought these soccer cleats for my grandson and he loved them. The price was also great
customer_reviews.text: I bought these soccer cleats for my grandson and he loved them.The price was also great.
customer_reviews.author: Norma Provenzano

customer_reviews.title: son loved them!!!
customer_reviews.text: My son ohhhh and ahhhh over the style and colour!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Stacey Mallette

customer_reviews.title: Great shoe, great value
customer_reviews.text: Great shoe, great value, great service. Grandson says they're a comfortable fit, especially over the thick soccer socks he has to wear. Thanks!
customer_reviews.author: Skip

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: They are easier on kids' feet than regular (firm ground) cleats. My 9 year old loves them.
customer_reviews.author: A. K.

customer_reviews.title: Fits too large beware of proper sizing
customer_reviews.text: I'm going to have to return these shoes since they are too large.
customer_reviews.author: incognito

customer_reviews.title: Great Soccer Shoe
customer_reviews.text: My 11 year old son loves these soccer shoes! They fit great and look great! Very good soccer shoe.
customer_reviews.author: Cindy Myers

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: My son likes these shoes. He'll grow out of them in a year, hope they last that long.
customer_reviews.author: SM

customer_reviews.title: They are very light weight and comfortable. They're also great quality for the price
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my son. They are very light weight and comfortable. They're also great quality for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Nelson & Susie Farnsworth

customer_reviews.title: Very nice looking. Quality seems good - we'll see how ...
customer_reviews.text: Very nice looking. Quality seems good - we'll see how they hold up for this season.
customer_reviews.author: WiscGrass

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very good sports shoe. I recommend it. They are also very nice.
customer_reviews.author: Gabriel C.

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable, Stylish Cleats
customer_reviews.text: Great cleats! I would purchase again and may do that given a growing 8 year old boy's feet. We've only had them for about 2 weeks, but so far so good.
customer_reviews.author: Ebes

customer_reviews.title: It is nice to have found a low-cost cleat that also fits ...
customer_reviews.text: These shoes work well for my son, who plays both club and travel soccer. It is nice to have found a low-cost cleat that also fits well and holds up during play.

customer_reviews.title: My son love shoes. Very light and looks cool
customer_reviews.text: My son love shoes . Very light and looks cool.
customer_reviews.author: Svetlana Rinda

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: My son really likes these cleats. We bought them for him to play flag football.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff Moody

customer_reviews.title: Son loves them. And now I can postpone getting ...
customer_reviews.text: Son loves them. And now I can postpone getting new glasses because I can tell which one he is on the field running around in bright orange cleats. Boom!
customer_reviews.author: Jeff

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable shoes
customer_reviews.text: Bought these soccer cleats for my 7 y.o. son. He likes the shoes and says they are very comfortable. No complaints.
customer_reviews.author: S Godbey

customer_reviews.title: Quality soccer shoes
customer_reviews.text: My son loves the look of these soccer shoes and has not had any complaints about the way they feel this soccer season.
customer_reviews.author: Efred

customer_reviews.title: Great soccer shoe
customer_reviews.text: My 5 year old loves his new soccer cleats and I was happy with the shipping and quality.
customer_reviews.author: Jamie

customer_reviews.title: Size too small
customer_reviews.text: My son wears size 11 currently and I bought size 12 but even then it's too small. The quality is okay. Not superb and not so bad either.
customer_reviews.author: Kamran Shafi

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic buy for the young soccer player. Great mix of style and cost.
customer_reviews.author: Robert

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: My 4 yr old loves his new boots. Decent quality-- what you'd expect from a kid's adidas soccer shoe.
customer_reviews.author: Richard C Pecoraro

customer_reviews.title: Great boot, F-series is very reliable.
customer_reviews.text: Stuck with Adidas for my U8 player, his third set of F series boots. Loves them.
customer_reviews.author: Charles Farnell

customer_reviews.title: Great fit, nice cleats
customer_reviews.text: Great fit , nice cleats , my lil girl loves them :-)
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good shoe so far
customer_reviews.text: Seems to be a good shoe. My son likes them but has only had a chance to wear once Would buy again next year.
customer_reviews.author: LS

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: My son is very happy with the cleats. They fit nicely and are very comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Carolina Posada

customer_reviews.title: Great value; good performance soccer shoe!
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic soccer shoe for the price! More cleats on the bottom than most soccer shoes and they are shorter than most cleats. I think this makes them a little more comfortable than most soccer shoes because there are less pressure points. Outside of shoe has a cool texture for gripping the ball. Pleased with purchase--my kids seem to like them!
customer_reviews.author: Sam Torchia

product_meta.title: adidas Performance F5 FXG J Firm-Ground Soccer Cleat (Little Kid/Big Kid)
product_meta.description: These boys' football boots give younger players goal-scoring speed and control. They have a lightweight and durable BRAVO synthetic upper and feature a bold allover graphic and a flexible ground outsole.
feature_bullets: F5 soccer gives you all the DNA of the F series at our best value
Synthetic leather upper for comfort and durability
Soft textile lining for comfort and fit
Die-cut ethylene vinyl acetate sockliner for comfort and cushion
New flexible firm ground tooling for natural and artificial outdoor surfaces
